description.value: A long fishing rod with a solid line, a steel hook and sinker, and a cork bobber.  You can use a Rest Action and expend 1 Fishing Bait to catch a single unexceptional fish with a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Instinct) Check. This fish can be cooked to feed a single creature.  When used with the Fishing Trade, it has a base fishing score of 1.
